Articles.Content:
I used to be ProjectXMark1, login troubles required that I had to re-register my account, which is annoying. I have a nagging feeling I may have been one of the victims of the Heartbleed bug.

So, in TLS-encrypted form, I shall inhabit this forum as normal.
Welcome back. (And now I need to do some research on the Heartbleed bug)
hmm last time i had login troubles, it turned out i had caplocks on but that aside Welcome Back!

I feel your pain, ProjectXMark1.1, and I am curious. If you wouldn't mind elaborating a bit more on why you believe you were a victim of the CVE-2014-0160 or Heartbleed bug, I would be grateful. From what I can understand, this is not an attack on your personal pc, but rather an attack on a service provider, such as the KSP forums, which leads to the exposure of any private information stored on that server. If you have proof that this is the case, it might be something the rest of us need to know.

Edited April 10, 2014 by Otis
